column2:
How can we get 10,000 girls to learn web3 in the next 6 months?

We have a new initiative for family friendly and female friendly NFT communities: A Spring / Summer coding, generative art and NFT extravaganza. 

If you run one of these communities, please reach out.

Coming in March - our Spring / Summer coding extravaganza. 

It‚Äôs a beautiful Sunday. Get out there and create something original.

Value in generative art lies in the versatility of the algorithm.¬†

Thank you @tylerxhobbs

The https://t.co/4iad6h4Fn6 team is growing!  We are looking for an awesome Discord Community manager.  Are you interested in building an inclusive environment connecting parents with their kids to our growing list of mentors?  Reach out to us, we would love to talk with you!

First you build your genesis art project. Then generative house. #3 could be generative road. And then generative forest. 

Could you build a game as you learn generative art?

That would kind of be like Ender‚Äôs Game. But let‚Äôs not tell the kids. 

@CuriousAddys @meta_angels
@TheJplaysmusic @doodles @coolcatsnft Awesome. Follow us for announcements. The action starts March 1. Learning as a community starts April 1.

Coming soon: we‚Äôll let you build a simple generative art project NFT collection in 5 minutes. 

It comes with a free a 500 hour curriculum to improve your art. 

And we‚Äôll have a massive campaign to get girls coding and building in web3. 

@worldofwomennft @BossBeautiesNFT
@inkscribr This would be great. I will DM
@KSTOR_digital @cypherchk Yes, please, let's connect. DMs are open. I have a story to tell.

Working on a massive 6 month effort to encourage 10,000+ girls to start coding and learning web3. 

Who wants to help?
@inkscribr So am I. We are going to have new users created very simple generative art NFTs in 5 minutes or less (and then they can spend 5 months or 5 years getting good it)
The devs are building a whole new onboarding flow. It‚Äôs about to be way easier to code generative art.

Gm everyone.

NFTs saw impressive growth numbers in 2021 vs 2020. Sales grew to $24.9 billion from $94.9 million and trades were made across 28.6 million wallets, up from 545k. However, 85% of the transactions were made by 10% of traders. August saw the greatest sales #s at $3.4 billion.

F. How can I help spread the word?

Communities sponsor contests. If you run an NFT or a kid friendly community, DMs are open.

If you have any other ideas, DMs are open.

If you can follow, like, retweet, and tag two friends, please do.

Thank you for helping kids learn web3!

E. How do the weekly generative art contests work?

Every Wednesday is a generative art contest submitting deadline. A panel picks the best art for that week which goes up as NFTs at https://t.co/kmAPLR27tP. All contest info is on the nav bar at https://t.co/bYJA36595T.

D. Can my kids / nieces / nephews / friends learn how to code their own art NFTs?

Yes. You can go to https://t.co/bYJA36595T and start for free on Studio, our learning platform, est. 2014 and used by over 50,000 students and 40+ school districts.

C. How do I shop the market?

Go to https://t.co/kmAPLR27tP. Browse for individual pieces or find the "buy one of everything button" to give widespread support to the movement of youth artists building web3 skills. Build your collection. Explore past projects.

B. Where is the community?

You can find us here:

https://t.co/dMF4joUGnR

Be the first to hear about new drops. Learn how to make your own art. Have fun. :)

A. Who are these artists?

https://t.co/pAewHPrRAs

https://t.co/kmAPLR27tP is now open with pieces from artists aged 9-17.

Buy some art‚Äîsupport the kids NFT community.

Your purchases support the talent coming up in web3. Their use of code, creativity, and design is remarkable.

...Even in their genesis art.
